name: GoldWings Flight Academy
about: GoldWings Flight Academy, located in Warsaw, Poland, is a dynamically expanding flight school specializing in professional pilot training. Owned by airline pilot Arkadiusz Jesionek, the academy focuses on training professionals in PPL(A), CPL(A), ME(A), FI(A), and ATPL(A). With a strong emphasis on safety and theoretical knowledge, GoldWings ensures students learn to fly through a structured and rigorous program. Instructors are strictly selected, many being airline pilots and captains, providing high-quality training. The academy offers a range of aircraft, including Cessna 172s, AT-3s, Piper III Seneca, and DA-42, along with advanced simulators for IR and MCC/JOC training. GoldWings is committed to providing integrated training and professional care, making it an ideal choice for aspiring pilots aiming to achieve their aviation goals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
